recommendations.name: David Hemmat
recommendations.jobTitle: CEO of Blue Coding (& Resolve Digital)
recommendations.text: Max was great to work with. He provided our team with a level of expertise in digital marketing that was highly valuable to us. Max led efforts related to inbound lead generation through our website, SEO and online presence, and was able to achieve important results in the improvement of our technical SEO and general website usability. Max worked closely with different teams across the organization to help coordinate the needs of the different departments related to our website (sales, marketing and recruitment).

recommendations.name: Shelley Mossman
recommendations.jobTitle: Customer Success Manager at Administrative Software Applications (ASA)
recommendations.text: The most valuable characteristics I see in Max are his integrity, his work ethic and his perceptive understanding of othersâ€™ needs. Coworkers and clients trust his word, they appreciate his willingness to work hard to achieve the right solution, and they truly benefit from his ability to understand what the client or co-worker needs. I would highly recommend Max to become a productive and valuable member of any business team.
